title: Alesha Dixon shows off envious post baby bod as she arrives at America's Got Talent studios
text:

Alesha Dixon was positively glowing as she arrived at America's Got Talent studios for filming.

The mum-of-two showed off her post baby bod as she stepped out in LA.

She hid her slim face behind a pair of shades and styled a white strappy vest with khaki paperbag trousers to enhance her slender physique.

Her dark hair was pulled off her face in a chic ponytail and she accessorised with a pair of stylish killer heels.

Alesha looked relaxed as she headed towards the entrance following the birth of her newborn daughter Anaya Safiya in August.

She kept the birth of her second born private and only announced the news on her Instagram page on her birthday a couple of weeks ago.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

In a heartwarming post, Alesha wrote: "Anaya Safiya born 20.08.19.

"7 weeks ago this little angel came into our lives! As I celebrate my birthday today I feel like the luckiest girl on the planet".

(Image: MEGA)

Alesha already shares daughter Azura Sienna, 6, with husband Azuka Ononye.

Back in May, the judge confirmed news of her pregnancy during a live episode of Britain's Got Talent.

(Image: MEGA)

Alesha stood up to reveal her blossoming bump for the first time midway through a song and dance routine performed by hosts Ant McPartlin and Declan Donnelly.

Once the secret was out, Alesha rocked incredible maternity wear throughout the rest of the series and for the final of Britain's Got Talent: The Champions stepped out in a stunning see-through dress.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

In recent weeks since the birth, the 41-year-old wasted no time returning to her glamorous showbiz lifestyle as she attended Simon Cowell's 60th birthday bash.

The singer headed to celebrity hotspot Nobu in Malibu with her hubby and daughter Azura.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

Alesha looked thrilled to be a part of the music mogul's milestone celebrations which was actually the same day as her 41st birthday.
description: The Britain's Got Talent judge was seen strolling into the Pasadena auditorium as she sported an outfit which showed off her post pregnancy curves
